title: LVN Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at Los Angeles Community Hospitals
Interview Descriptions:
Interview was Average. not difficult. 
the interview process was very straight forward, typical interview questions. I had no issues. well organized. after interview offered letter was sent via email  within the same week...
Interview Questions: Tell me about yourself, where do you see yourself in 5 years

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Los Angeles Community Hospitals in Jun 2021
Interview Descriptions: Recruiter asked few questions on the phone. Than she set up a in person meeting with the Nurse Manager. Interview was smooth and easy. Nurse Manager was asked general questions like where did you go to school, where do you see yourself in 5 years.
Interview Questions: Where do you see yourself in 5 years?

title: RN Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at Los Angeles Community Hospitals
Interview Descriptions: Interview was 1:1 in the cafeteria of the hospital during a job fair. Questions are simple; patient scenarios, your strengths and weaknesses. Quick interview, and offer given within a week.
Interview Questions: Signs and symptoms of patient with pneumonia?

title: Refgistered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Los Angeles Community Hospitals (Los Angeles, CA) in Jun 2020
Interview Descriptions: Applied online, interviews 4 weeks later.  Easy interview, 15 minutes. It was a one on one interview at the facility.  Asked a few questions about you and then nursing fundamental questions as well.

title: RN Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. The process took 5 days. I interviewed at Los Angeles Community Hospitals (Los Angeles, CA) in May 2020
Interview Descriptions: First of all, they call you and ask some simple resume questions, They double check all parts of resume with you.then you do the online assessment and finally, they set an in-person interview.
Interview Questions: How many years do you have experience?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Los Angeles Community Hospitals (Los Angeles, CA) in Apr 2020
Interview Descriptions: The questions were very basic interview questions and not that bad. Asked why do I want this job and why would it be the best fit for me. It was easy
Interview Questions: why do you want this job

title: RN Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. I interviewed at Los Angeles Community Hospitals
Interview Descriptions: it was ok, not easy or hard, overall good interview and a fair amount of questions asked. just be prepared with scenario questions. The interview process took about 3 weeks.
Interview Questions: What would do type of questions
